column5: HLF been expecting higher 436 but Ill add some here short The problem isnt just that its a shady unwelcome business worldwide its that management has been less than forthcoming OK I mean lying about their business prospects in China Theyre not welcome there and the lack of business operating licenses issued there speaks volumes Peeps think the Netflix Ackman production was ineffective It might not have had the desired effect at the time it showed but you can bet any foreign regulator that looks into this company knows of it Herbalife is running out of peeps to burn The last peeps itll burn are its investors Its how grifters operate
HLF obvious rebound then you short more
HLF The market is melting down but institutions keep pumping this POS Cant wait for them to selloff at the end of the day Like they always do
HLF Did people forget there are still two active class action lawsuits against Herbalife
